text: Eygliers is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D37, D37L, D137, D137T, D237, D337, D902 and N94 roads pass through the commune. === Rail === The commune has a railway station called Montdauphin-Guillestre. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes- Alpes
title: Eygliers
